response: you must be aware that twitter is an american company and the law regarding data privacy in germany is quite strict. according to this law, you have the right to ask about what kind of data a company is collecting from you and how they are using it. moreover, you can demand them to delete your personal information at any time if you do not want them to use it further. it is essential for every social media user to be aware of their rights regarding privacy and data protection.
